text: (nabiye! oba veta vastun kisivak nomætiva e venuven) oba, obage deviyange varaprasadayan balaporottuven sitina avasthavakadi, (oba veta kavurun ho pæmina) kumak ho illa ovunva pratiksepa kara hærimata sidu vuvahot (ovun samaga kopayen yutuva kata nokaranu). itamat karunavanta vadanama ovunta pavasanu mænava
